products.label: Risk Engagement
products.title: Respond swiftly and decisively
products.subtitle: Assess and address your cyber risk head on. Become compliant in your choice of frameworks that align with business objectives.

pageContent.title:
Risk
Engagement
pageContent.subtitle: Defining the Cost of Cyber Risk is the #1 Challenge Organizations Face.

benefits.subtitle: At OneTier, we offer data aggregation for your business environments, so you can see exactly what is happening, and where it is happening.

features.title: Cost of your Cyber Risk
features.description: OneTier scans your enterprise to define cyber risk, identifying high-risk areas and associated costs. Focus your budget where it impacts security the most.

features.title: Compliance Management
features.description: Looking to become compliant in the latest standards, SOC2, ISO27001, CMMC 2.0, FedRAMP, HiTrust? We have you covered with AI-driven compliance tools.

features.title: CMMC 2.0 Compliance
features.description: Whether it is a CMMC Level 1 self assessment, a Level 2 with independent audit, or a Level 3 with government audit, we have you covered.

features.title: FedRAMP & StateRAMP
features.description: Using our scanning and AI documentation tools, we can reduce FedRAMP certification time from years to months, saving both time and money.

visual-guide.subtitle: At OneTier, we offer data aggregation for your business environments, to you can see exactly what is happening, and where it is happening.

events.title: MACo Summer Conference
events.subtitle: Connecting Maryland's local government leaders
events.moreInfo: MACo's Summer Conference brings together approximately 3,000 leaders from all levels of government and the private sector. With four days of educational sessions, along with 2 exhibit shows (over 350 vendors!), and numerous briefings, meetings, and opportunities to connect with counties, this conference is a can't-miss event for anyone involved in Maryland's local government interests.

share.title: Join us at the MACo Summer Conference 2024
share.description: Connect with 3,000+ government leaders at the Roland Powell Convention Center in Ocean City, MD, August 14-17, 2024.

events.title: OIGA Conference and Trade Show
events.subtitle: The biggest little show in Indian Gaming
events.imageAlt: OIGA Conference and Trade Show logo
events.moreInfo: The 2024 OIGA Conference and Trade Show will be held in Oklahoma City, OK August 12-14, and will draw nearly 3,000 vendors, visitors and guest speakers to Oklahoma City to celebrate and advance our industry. It is a lively, fun, informative, high-energy assembly of some of the biggest names in the gaming and hospitality industries.

share.title: Experience the OIGA Conference and Trade Show 2024
share.description: Join 3,000+ gaming industry professionals in Oklahoma City, August 12-14, 2024.

events.title: TechNet Augusta
events.subtitle: Transform, Align, Accelerate for Pacing Challenges
events.moreInfo: TechNet Augusta 2024 gives participants the opportunity to examine and explore the intricacies of the cyber domain. With assistance from the U.S. Army Cyber Center of Excellence and industry experts, the conference is designed to open the lines of communication and facilitate networking, education and problem solving.

share.title: Join us at TechNet Augusta 2024
share.description: Explore cyber domain challenges with military and industry experts, August 19-22, 2024 in Augusta, GA.

events.title: DEF CON 32
events.subtitle: The world's largest hacker convention
events.moreInfo: DEF CON is a hacker convention which takes place immediately following Black Hat in Las Vegas every year. Tickets are available for purchase through Black Hat registration until August 2, 2024, or on-site at the Las Vegas Convention Center during DEF CON.

share.title: Attend DEF CON 32 in Las Vegas
share.description: Join the world's largest hacker community at DEF CON 32, August 8-11, 2024 in Las Vegas.
